actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend title XIV of the Public Health Service Act to provide Federal grants for small public water systems to meet national primary drinking water regulations.
short_title: Small Town Safe Drinking Water Assistance Act of 1979

summary.text: Small Town Safe Drinking Water Assistance Act of 1979 - Amends title XIV of the Public Health Service Act (Safety of Public Water Systems) to authorize the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to make grants to enable small public water systems to meet primary and interim drinking water regulations which are prescribed under such Act.

titles.title: Small Town Safe Drinking Water Assistance Act of 1979
A bill to amend title XIV of the Public Health Service Act to provide Federal grants for small public water systems to meet national primary drinking water regulations.
